text: Malcolm X (1925–1965), born Malcolm Little, was an American Muslim minister and human rights activist. Malcolm Little may also refer to: *Malcolm Orme Little (1857–1931), British Army cavalry officer and champion polo player *Malcolm Archibald Albert Little (1904–1944), British Army colonel and polo player; son of Malcolm Orme Little ==See also== *Little Malcolm, 1974 British comedy drama film
title: Malcolm Little (disambiguation)
